title: Initialize shadcn/ui Design System
description: Set up shadcn/ui with custom theme, CSS variables, and base components

objective.what: Initialize shadcn/ui with Resonant brand colors, dark mode first, and install base components
objective.why: shadcn/ui provides accessible, customizable components that match our design system requirements
objective.outcome: shadcn/ui configured with brand theme and 15+ base components installed

commands: pnpm dlx shadcn@latest add button card input label form toast sonner dialog dropdown-menu avatar badge separator skeleton textarea scroll-area sidebar sheet tabs table tooltip popover command alert alert-dialog breadcrumb checkbox collapsible context-menu hover-card menubar navigation-menu progress radio-group select slider switch toggle toggle-group

prompt.mission: Set up shadcn/ui design system for Resonant.ai with dark mode first approach
tasks: Initialize shadcn/ui with pnpm dlx shadcn@latest init
Configure components.json with new-york style and zinc base
Update globals.css with Resonant brand CSS variables (blue primary)
Install all base components (button, card, input, form, dialog, etc.)
Add Inter and Space Mono fonts via next/font
constraints: NEVER use Heroicons, FontAwesome, or other icon libraries
Use Inter for text, Space Mono for code/mono
validation: All components render in dark mode

quality: CSS variables set for dark mode
Inter and Space Mono fonts configured

troubleshooting.stylesNotApplying: Check globals.css imports and tailwind.config.ts content paths
